name: JavaScriptExecutionMode

properties.name: NEVER
properties.description: Never show the JavaScript debugger. Treat runtime errors by throwing a JavaScript exceptions.

properties.name: ONRUNTIMEERROR
properties.description: Show the JavaScript debugger if a runtime error occurs.

properties.name: BEFORERUNNING
properties.description: Show the JavaScript debugger when the first line of the JavaScript executes.

description: When should a JavaScript debugger be shown.
